title: Drawing, "Interior of a Bedroom", 1820s
medium: Brush and watercolor on white wove paper
provenance: Eugene V. Thaw Collection; Gabriel Terrades, Galerie Grunspan, Paris
dimensions:
Frame H x W x D: 39.7 x 50.2 x 2.5 cm (15 5/8 x 19 3/4 x 1 in.)
Sheet: 12.7 x 19.7 cm (5 x 7 3/4 in.)
description: This view features a woman's bedroom, identified as such by the bonnet next to the ribbon-framed mirror and the blue slippers at the foot of the bed. Scandinavian design is shown in the bed at the right, draped in white cotton; curtains-to-match hang at the large French windows in the rear of the room. The ash-colored wooden furniture along with the wide wood planked floor and buff-colored walls indicate that this may be a summer retreat or hotel. Views of the countryside are seen through the windows.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Interior of a Bedroom", 1820s.Brush and watercolor on white wove paper. Thaw Collection. 2007-27-84.
